title: How to silence the shutter sound while taking screenshot on pixel 4a
content: How can I silence the shutter sound while taking screenshot in Pixel 4a? I tried going to DND mode and it did not work. I reduced volume, no use. I tried all possible available options including the settings in System UI. but no use. I really want to remove this sound. Can anyone please help me understand this? And give me a solution, please?
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 4a
